text: Charles Lindy Waddell (May 13, 1932 â€“ July 19, 2022) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the Virginia Senate from 1972 to 1998. He was deputy transportation secretary to Governor Jim Gilmore. He was the step-father of former Virginia Attorney General Mark Herring. He was born in Braselton, Georgia. Waddell died on July 19, 2022 in Leesburg, Virginia at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
